level.heading: Legislative History of Law 20-96
level.text: Law 20-96, the "Omnibus Health Regulation Amendment Act of 2014," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-153. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 3, 2013 and January 7, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 5, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-273 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-96 became effective on March 26, 2014.
